name: Flickr compact  - OUTDATED
description:
Makes Flickr pages more compact in vertical dimension.
Flickr introduced new liquid design in May, 2012, but it has plenty of empty space that forces users to scroll.
Also, makes the Action menu on single photo page fit even 1024x600 screen.
additional_info:
Version 0.4:
Smooth text shadow in justified view image metadata text. Improving appearance on screens without text smoothing.
Version 0.3:
New web uploader improved
Version 0.2:
Faves block in justified view improved
Version 0.1:
First release, tested on first page, /activity page, photostream and single photo page.
